oai_dc:dc.dc:title: United States Cavalry guidon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: United States Cavalry guidon brought home by Cpl. Edward Wiseman, Co. C, 2nd Wisconsin Cav. Regt., USA. The guidon is made from silk and is machine sewn. It is swallowtail shaped and contains thirty-four stars.; The 2nd Wisconsin Cavalry was in the siege of Vicksburg and the siege of Jackson, Mississippi.
